description.p: Plezy is a modern, open-source client for Plex Media Server. It features a clean interface built with Flutter and uses MPV for powerful media playback.

ul.li: Authentication: Sign in with Plex, automatic server discovery, and persistent sessions.
Media Browsing: Browse libraries with rich metadata, collections, and playlists.
Playback: Wide codec support (HEVC, AV1, VP9), HDR and Dolby Vision support, and full subtitle compatibility.
Downloads: Download media for offline viewing with background queue management.
Watch Together: Synchronized playback with friends.
